patthana11.16:4.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana11.16:4.2: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana11.16:4.3: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe … cha.
patthana11.16:5.1: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana11.16:5.2: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana11.16:5.3: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe … cha.
patthana11.16:6.1: Naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana11.16:7.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakusalañca naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ nakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana11.16:8.1: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakusalañca naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ nakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana11.16:9.1: Hetuyā tiṃsa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … aññamaññe pañcavīsa … pe … avigate tiṃsa.
patthana11.16:10.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana11.16:11.1: Hetuyā tiṃsa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … aññamaññe pañcavīsa … pe … avigate tiṃsa.
patthana11.16:12.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
